Topics for the weeks that are following that are as follows:

1)1 more week of dual class discussion
  
2)Game Issues of Potion of Speed, Speed, and Teleporters
  
3)Game Issues of Generators
 
4)Game Issues of Experience Points & Experience Levels
  
5)Game Issues of Basic Intelligence for characters - Scenario trivia 
contest answers need to be emailed to me by this week.
 
6)Scenario Trivia Contest - I'll hit answers to the objective  
questions first  during the first week, then tackle 2-3 objective  
questions at a time.  That's going to take 4 weeks minimum to go  
through those.
 
7)Critique of dph's legimate scenarios.  Don't worry I will not  
"punish" anyone for bad reviews.  This will take a few weeks and 
I'll also be listing what the heck was going through my mind when I 
 designed each of my scenarios.

8)ideas for high experience levels

9)the advantages and disadvantages of single player teams

10)Why I believe Gladiator is a really, great game

11)Various Ways to make scenarios more . . . interesting
